name: MEC Cityscape Daypack - Unisex
description: Keep it simple with a basic backpack at an attractive price. Classic MEC style uses water-resistant fabric and padding in the shoulder straps and back panel to make it comfortable to tote. Has a spacious main compartment and a separate space for your laptop.Made of water resistant and lightweight 200-denier ripstop nylon.Comfortably padded shoulder straps and back panel.Roomy main compartment has 1 zippered interior pocket.Laptop sleeve with rear top entry holds a 15in. laptop.Durable webbing grab handle.Flat front pocket with key clip.Side pockets fold flat when not in use and have shock-cord loops for water bottles.
